select new com.jshx.prosafedesign.entity.ProSafDes(t.id, t.areaName, t.companyName, t.projectNature, t.projectType, t.recordNum, t.recordDate,t.createUserID) from ProSafDes t where t.delFlag = 0
and t.deptId in (:deptCodes)
and t.id in (:ids)
and t.areaId = :areaId
and t.areaName like :areaName
and t.recordNum >= :startRecordNum
and t.recordNum <= :endRecordNum
and t.projectType = :projectType
and t.companyName like :companyName
and t.recordDate like :recordDate
and t.projectNature = :projectNature
and INSTR(t.companyId,:companmyIds) >0
and t.companyId = :companyId
and ( t.companyName like :searchLike or t.recordDate like :searchLike)
order by t.createTime desc
